TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DeviceSpecific extends System.Web.UI.Control

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("The System.Web.Mobile.dll assembly has been deprecated and should no longer be used. For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=157231.")

summary.span: 提供一个构造，用于在 [<DeviceSpecific>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b) 元素中的多个备选内容间指定选择。

span.span: Provides a construct for specifying a choice among multiple content alternatives in the [<DeviceSpecific>](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b) element.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

span.span: For information about how to develop ASP.NET mobile applications, see Mobile Apps & Sites with ASP.NET.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 内[ \](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b)元素中，您通常会指定一个或多个[\<选择 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)元素，每个包含指定如何评估所选的属性根据目标设备功能。Within a [\](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b) element, you typically specify one or more [\](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) elements, each containing attributes that specify how to evaluate the choice against target device capabilities. 在运行时，每一种选择按顺序评估，并使用已成功进行计算的第一个选项。At run time, each choice is evaluated in order, and the first choice that is successfully evaluated is used. DeviceSpecific/Choice 构造用于指定模板集，然后重写属性，例如，使用它来指定特定于设备的图像的控件。The DeviceSpecific/Choice construct is used to specify template sets and override properties; for example, it can be used to specify device-specific images for the control. > [!NOTE] > 即使类继承自 Web 窗体`System.Web.UI.Control`命名空间，这是实现详细信息。Even though the class inherits from the Web Forms `System.Web.UI.Control` namespace, this is only an implementation detail. 一个``元素和控件一样不符。A `` element does not behave like a control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和要移动的窗体中创建接口的特定于使用不同的设备对象。The following code example demonstrates how to use and objects to create interfaces specific to a variety of devices in a mobile form. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-aspx-csharp[MobileTemplateContainerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTemplateContainerSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[MobileTemplateContainerSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileTemplateContainerSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)] 所有上面的代码可以以声明方式替换为以下标记：All of the code above can be replaced declaratively with the following markup: 这些示例中，为 Web.config 文件必须具有以下元素：For these examples, the Web.config file must have the following elements:

The collection of choices in a element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在运行时，集合中的选项进行评估存储它们的顺序。At run time, the choices in the collection are evaluated in the order that they are stored. 有关选择和特定于设备的概念的详细信息，请参阅[\<选择 >](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d)元素。For more information about choice and device-specific concepts, see the [\](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/c81bee77-bb45-4211-be0f-e13a040b3c2d) element. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何将属性显示的模板包含在 ASP.NET 移动 Web 应用程序中定义的第一个筛选器的数量。The following code example demonstrates the use of the property to display the number of templates contained in the first filter defined in the ASP.NET mobile Web application. 有关更完整的代码示例，请参阅示例概述。For a more complete code sample, see the example for the overview. > [!NOTE] > 下面的代码示例使用单个文件代码模型，如果直接复制到代码隐藏文件可能无法正常运行。The following code sample uses the single-file code model and may not work correctly if copied directly into a code-behind file. 此代码示例必须复制到具有.aspx 扩展名的空文本文件。This code sample must be copied into an empty text file that has an .aspx extension. 有关详细信息，请参阅[ASP.NET Web 窗体页代码模型](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417)。For more information, see [ASP.NET Web Forms Page Code Model](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/81b13e7a-b95b-4285-906f-d2dd77411417). [!code-csharp[MobileDeviceSpecificSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileDeviceSpecificSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[MobileDeviceSpecificSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileDeviceSpecificSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用禁用页面的视图状态管理属性的指令，也可以通过设置其个人禁用上各个控件的视图状态属性。You can disable view-state management for the page by using the attribute of the directive, or you can disable view state on individual controls by setting their individual properties.

The currently selected choice.

remarks.format: ## Remarks DeviceSpecific/Choice 构造可用于指定特定于设备的内容，如属性重写或模板，为控件或样式。You can use a DeviceSpecific/Choice construct to specify device-specific content, such as property overrides or templates, for a control or style. 若要从中提供的选项中选择一个选项[ \](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b)元素，ASP.NET 的计算结果按顺序对目标设备的功能的每个选项。To select a choice from the choices in a [\](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/5984e67a-91cf-4f32-8815-7e7fab3d3b5b) element, ASP.NET evaluates each choice in sequential order against the capabilities of the target device. 第一个匹配选项由选定的选项，并将用于特定于设备的内容。The first matching choice is made the selected choice, and is used for device-specific content. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用属性来显示与当前的选择相关联的筛选器。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to display the filter associated with the current choice. 有关更完整的代码示例，请参阅示例概述。For a more complete code sample, see the example for the overview. [!code-csharp[MobileDeviceChoiceSample#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileDeviceChoiceSample/cs/Default.aspx#1)] [!code-vb[MobileDeviceChoiceSample#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/MobileDeviceChoiceSample/vb/Default.aspx#1)]
